title: Agent Tool
description: MCP tool trigger for AI agents

name.title: Tool Name
name.description: Unique name of the MCP tool. This is how agents will identify and call the tool.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description of what the tool does. Agents use this to decide when to call the tool.
examples: Retrieves current weather data for a given location

inputSchema.title: Input Schema
inputSchema.description: JSON Schema defining the tool's input parameters (MCP inputSchema).

outputSchema.title: Output Schema
outputSchema.description: Optional JSON Schema defining the expected shape of the tool's output for consistent agent responses.

key.title: Key
key.description: The API key or bearer token value.
